item.title: W5-S2 Integration Techniques
item.description: 周次: 5 日期: March 25, 2022 节次: 2 In this course, we will discuss the definition of hyperbolic functions. And we shift our attention to several integration techniques. These techniques can help us integrate more functions. A typical technique called “Integration by Parts” will be discussed as well.
